trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Port Charlotte
There was one other sighting in Port Charlotte on or around October 21st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsEverything is exactly the way I stated in the prior report, but after seeing other reports... especially the one from Missouri who had a diagram of exactly what I saw minus one "star".... they were all calling it Jupiter... I just wanted to clarify that my "North Star" could have been Jupiter. Diagram below.... (Moon) O *(Jupiter) * (uknown) * (unknown)
